attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is an unjust and unfair tax. Energy is not a luxury,and as such, the 5% VAT should be removed immediately.

rejection.details:
This petiton overlap several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/vatonpowerbills/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
